title: Katy Perry Looks Better Than Ever In Her Birthday Suit! She's 35!
text:
It's Katy Perry's birthday and the beautiful one-piece swimsuit photo makes us want to hop on some "Harleys In Hawaii."

The singer shared a picture of herself standing in the water, all decked out in flowers on her 35th birthday.

Perry never looked better and has that glow that can only be achieved taking in the sights and sounds of the ocean.

"35 and never more alive," the star captioned her post.

Katy is no stranger to the water, in fact, her love for paddleboarding is well documented.

Related:

Katy Perry Announces New Single Will Drop This Week & Fans Are Freaking Out!

Katy Perry's $120,000 Missing Jewelry Lawsuit Dropped

Katy Perry's Dancer in 'Teenage Dream' Video Accuses Her of Sexual Harassment

Katy Perry to Fork Over $550K for 'Dark Horse' Damages

Katy Perry's 'Dark Horse' Copied From Christian Rap Song, Jury Rules

Full Bloom

View photos

It has been a big year for the pop star because she got engaged to Orlando Bloom back in February.

The couple made the announcement on Valentine's Day by sharing an adorable photo with her ring on full display!

"Full bloom," she wrote. Her "Lord of the Rings" posted the photo too, writing, "lifetimes."

Mom Ruined The Surprise

Perry's mom leaked the engagement news by posting her own announcement on Facebook, which she later deleted. "Look who got engaged on Valentines Day!" she reportedly wrote before eradicating the post ... probably at the behest of her famous daughter.

Perry and Orlando have been dating on and off for three years and shared their first red carpet appearance together in September.

Harleys and ASMR

View photos

Katy has been promoting and celebrating the success of her new single, "Harleys In Hawaii," and even made a hilarious ASMR video where she reads the lyrics.

The video was shot at the Harley Davidson headquarters and featured Bill, a mechanic that is working on a motorcycle in the background.
